dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notices - beerandshots.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2005 1:11 AM
To: Peter Jakab
Cc: damatrix@2ya.co.uk; customerservice@networksolutions.com;
vr86q59r73m@networksolutionsprivateregistration.com; abuse@mindlash.com;
abuse@networksolutions.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Notices - beerandshots.com

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

Peter Jakab wrote:
|
|     _RE:  Digital Millennium Copyright Act (?DMCA?) Notice_
|
|
|
| URL?s Bearing Infringing Materials:   www.beerandshots.com
| <http://www.beerandshots.com/>
|
| **
|
|     *IP Address*:  67.19.246.185
|
|     *Name Server*:  NS3.VMAFIA.COM (67.19.246.180)
|
|     *Name Server*:  NS4.VMAFIA.COM  (67.19.246.181)
|
|     *Registrant:* Network Solutions, LLC.
|
|     *WebHost*:  DaMatrix Project
|
|     *IP Registrar*:  ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
|
|
|
| Dear Sir or Madam:
|
|
|
| We are litigation counsel for Carrie Tucker.   It has come to our
| attention that your website pages bearing the URL above have been
| copying, displaying, distributing, and/or linking to videotapes or their
| digitized versions, containing likenesses of Carrie Tucker (?Videos?)
| and still photographs containing likenesses of Carrie Tucker (?Photos?).
|
|
|
| The Videos and Photos are all the exclusive copyrighted work of Ms.
| Tucker.  Ms. Tucker's copyrights to the Videos and Photos have all been
| filed for registration by the U.S. Copyright Office.
|
|
|
| I have a _good faith belief_ that your copying, displaying,
| distributing, and/or linking to the Videos and Photos on the Internet
| (or anywhere else) constitutes willful and unlawful infringement of Ms.
| Tucker?s copyrights.  Neither Ms. Tucker, nor the Videos' co-producer
| (see attached affidavit) has ever granted a license or permission of any
| kind to any person or entity.  In addition, your linking to infringing
| material or even posting without a link the addresses of sites with
| infringing material will subject you to contributory copyright
| infringement.  Furthermore, you have misappropriated Ms. Tucker?s name,
| likeness and title which will subject you to additional liabilities and
| penalties under federal and state statutory and common laws.
|
|
|
| We hereby demand that you immediately and permanently remove all Videos
| and Photos containing likenesses of Ms. Tucker from all websites and
| other media that you own or control and remove any and all links, URLs
| and/or references to said infringing materials.
|
|
|
| Failure to do so will leave us no choice but to file suit against you
| for injunction, damages, attorney?s fees and other penalties under the
| DMCA, the Copyright Act and other federal and state laws without further
| notice to you.  You probably know that these laws provide copyright
| holders like Ms. Tucker with very strong remedies against, and that the
| courts have dealt severely with, infringers like you under similar
| circumstances.
|
|
|
| Please acknowledge to me by email (ptrjakab@yahoo.com
| <http://mail.yahoo.com/config/login?/ym/Compose?To=ptrjakab@yahoo.com>)
| or letter that:
|
|
|
| 1.      you have permanently stopped using, publishing, distributing,
| copying, displaying, linking to, selling, licensing or otherwise
| exploiting the Videos and/or the Photos in any manner, including any
| other websites that you are affiliated with;
|
|
|
| 2.      you have destroyed all electronic and hard copies of the Videos
| and Photos, including all system backups;
|
|
|
| 3.      you have informed every identifiable person and entity who works
| with you, or with your affiliated websites and companies, of the above
| information;
|
|
|
| 4.      an accounting of any and all monies that you and any affiliated
| websites have received from the use, publishing, distribution, copying,
| displaying and any other exploitation of the Videos and the Photos;
|
| 5.      a list of websites, with URLs and contact information, that you
| are affiliated with or have linking agreements with;
|
|
|
| 6.      the source including a list of names, e-mail addresses, and any
| other contact information of those persons and/or other entities from
| which you obtained the Videos and the Photos.
|
|
|
| I acknowledge that the above-stated information is true and accurate and
| that I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright holder, Ms. Tucker.
|
|
|
| /S/
|
| PETER JAKAB
|
| cc: Ms. Carrie Tucker
|
| ------------------------------------------------------------
|
| PETER JAKAB
|
| FEIN & JAKAB
|
| ATTORNEYS AT LAW
|
| 233 BROADWAY ? SUITE 930
|
| NEW YORK, NY  10279
|
| 212/732-9290 PH
|
| 212/227-6479 FX
|
| E-MAIL: ptrjakab@yahoo.com
|
| ------------------------------------------------------------
|
| The information contained herein is confidential and may contain
| attorney-client or other privileged information and is intended only for
| the individual or entity to whom it is addressed. Any unauthorized use,
| distribution, copying, or publishing of this communication in whole or
| in part is strictly prohibited.  If you have received this e-mail in
| error, please notify the law office of FEIN & JAKAB immediately at
| 212/732-9290 and kindly delete it from your computer or server. Thank you
|
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------
| Do you Yahoo!?
| Read only the mail you want - Yahoo! Mail SpamGuard
|
<http://us.rd.yahoo.com/mail_us/taglines/spamguard/*http://promotions.yahoo.
com/new_mail/static/protection.html>.

|
